name: Juiceez (Battaramulla)
description: It was my first time stepping into Juiceez in Battaramulla, or any of their branches for that matter. I was expecting nothing more than just a cash counter and a little stall serving juice - like they have at roots, but Juiceez is a lot more than just a juice shop. They’ve got fresh fruits, vegetables, jams, special types of rice, even plant seeds and specialized indoor plants are on display.
